#summary How to create a new translation?
#labels FAQ,eng,1.9.x

=== How to create a new translation? ===

1) If interface language does not exist, add language and fill all fields correctly: Service -> Localization -> Languages -> Add 
2) Translate phrases: Service -> Localization -> Translation variants
3) Make sure that the language has appear in the list of available translations: Service -> Localization -> Translations
